channel.title: A Source with every protection.. I guess
channel.description:
Hi there again LoL
I was wondering if someone knows a source that has a protection against laughing man. That guy as entered my server and I don't know what else to do.
He changes ip's and name! He uses alt codes for the name so I can't ban him..
I wonder if someone knows how to stop him and if possible, can give me a good source that as that protection included.

item.title: A Source with every protection.. I guess
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:9, topic:281649”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=372082.msg2809188#msg2809188 date=1243891634]
[sarcasm]Good idea, surely that will get you some answers.[/sarcasm]
[/quote]

You forgot your sarcasm tags, here let me fix that for you.[/quote]
Oh, right.
Thanks.

Read full topic

item.source: A Source with every protection.. I guess

item.title: A Source with every protection.. I guess
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:3, topic:281649”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=372082.msg2809112#msg2809112 date=1243889821]

nope its not possible lol

Sure it is, just no-one has figured it out yet, which I’m not surprised about.
[/quote]
I know how to stop it…

Change some packets on your client and make it so if you don’t log in with that client that packets are changed and the person not on your client, I.E. : Laughing man, will crash.[/quote]
There are definitely solutions serverside though, but I don’t run a server, so why should I care?

Oh, and when I said no-one I just meant the people that were making a big deal out of it.

Read full topic
item.source: A Source with every protection.. I guess

item.title: A Source with every protection.. I guess
item.dc:creator: @bower007 bower007
item.description:
@bower007 wrote:

I didn’t understand cocoa… LoL…

If you guys can help me out… I’ll keep this topic and don’t spam…

I’m having the common problem of no-ip… I’ve created it and download it… I’ve used bitcomet to open the port 43594 but idk if people can connect now…

Can someone try please?

I’M NOT ADVERTISING! JUST TO SEE IF IT WORKS OR NOT!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:281649”][quote author=the hunt link=topic=372082.msg2809037#msg2809037 date=1243886791]
nope its not possible lol
[/quote]
Sure it is, just no-one has figured it out yet, which I’m not surprised about.[/quote]
I know how to stop it…

Change some packets on your client and make it so if you don’t log in with that client that packets are changed and the person not on your client, I.E. : Laughing man, will crash.
